subject: Football
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame Class of 2009 will be announced Saturday, and Rod Woodson, a cornerback and safety who played 17 N.F.L. seasons, is one of 17 finalists.
snippet: The Hall of Fame Class of 2009 will be announced Saturday, and Rod Woodson, a cornerback and safety who played 17 N.F.L. seasons, is one of 17 finalists.
